One of the better games to play with friends online.  Running around the board hunting them or escaping from them with other friends.  It is an older game, but kept fresh with new characters released regularly in the form of DLCs you purchase from classic horror films.

Interesting concept, fun to play when you're starting out, I enjoy the characters. However, there are so many constant bugs and glitches, downtime, and mean spirited players that it's not worth buying.

The game is a very well made game with many different styles of play for both the killer, and the survivor. It is not to difficult to play and is also not a pay to win game because a lot of killers, and survivors have very good perks even starting are very good.

is fun but when kiler toxcic is no fun

For a seasoned veteran this game could be fun. It has a very high skill ceiling and the atmosphere and design play well into the horror atmosphere. But it features a steep learning curve for new players just because of the sandbagging. Games are very lopsided, with either the killer completely dominating or the survivors in control so much that they even harass and grief the killer. The game formula gets repetitive really quick, repair the generators and get out. For 20 bucks you get only a hand of survivors and killers-- everything else is locked behind DLCs and Microtransactions.

my firend Bjarni is an ignorant idiot and i hate this game

Love and hate the game but always come back for more.  Sometimes you think the game isn't fair and you get dumped on, and the very next game you do the dumping.  They try their best to balance the game, they cater to a very wide audience and when they mess up - they are very quick to admit fault and try to remedy the situation. I would say that DBD is lucky to have a team that is willing to admit fault and look for paths forward.

I've been playing this game for 2 or 3 years, i like the game but sometimes it gives an unpleasurable experience that cannot be fixed. The matchmaking sometimes is quite random sometimes since i play with a mixed party. Although ii do enjoy the game since its very relevant in my group. What i dont like is that buying all the dlc's for the game is almost 60/70 and most of them are on sale currently. But thats basically it, if i had to rate the game it would be a 7/10.
